sys_ux_client_script.name: Set Initial Data

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_94ff0708475a3110036bbce5536d432d
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Create Default">2ad63bc7470a3110036bbce5536d4385</macroponent><name>Set Initial Data</name><preset/><required_translations>[
    
]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 * @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    
   //Moving To and Fro from pages
   if(api.state.account.id !== '-1' && api.state.contact.id !== '-1')
        return;

    //Navigating from Customer Account
    if (api.context.props.account != undefined && api.context.props.account != "" && api.context.props.account != "-1"){
        api.setState('contact_query', `account=${api.context.props.account}`);
        api.data.get_account_info.refresh();
    }else{
        //Load All the Accounts
        api.setState('account_query','');
    }

    //Navigating from Customer order Record
    if(api.context.props.sysId != undefined && api.context.props.sysId != "" && api.context.props.sysId != "-1")
       api.data.get_order_db.refresh();
    
    
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-10-30 19:46:43</sys_created_on><sys_id>94ff0708475a3110036bbce5536d432d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set Initial Data</sys_name><sys_package display_value="AT&amp;T Workspace" source="x_876519_att_work">e90c1d2e47c63110036bbce5536d43e6</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="AT&amp;T Workspace">e90c1d2e47c63110036bbce5536d43e6</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_94ff0708475a3110036bbce5536d432d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-10-30 19:46:43</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
